title: WHO Surgical Safety Checklist
description: The World Health Organisation (WHO) first published their Surgical Safety Checklist in 2010. It's a series of five critical steps that surgical teams should perform before and after surgical procedures to reduce the risk of certain adverse events.

beforeInduction.title: Before Induction of Anaesthesia
beforeInduction.description: Complete this section with at least the nurse and anaesthetist.

identityConfirmed.title: Has the patient confirmed his/her identity, site, procedure, and consent?

machineAndMedicationCheck.title: Is the anaesthesia machine and medication check complete?

pulseOximeterFunctioning.title: Is the pulse oximeter on the patient and functioning?

bloodLossRisk.title: Difficult airway or aspiration risk?
enum: Yes, and two IVs/central access and fluids planned
